title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1807.3 - Administrative agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1807.3 - Administrative agreements

State Regulations

The commission may complete appropriate administrative
agreements or arrangements to carry out this registration requirement through
the offices of member jurisdictions. Forms developed by the commission shall
apprise registrants of any such agreements or arrangements, and provide
appropriate instructions to complete and submit the form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1807.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
